Whirlwind (Air8 Evoc): R800' Wind in 10' radius inflicts 3d6 HP, then 1d8 HP/rd for 10 rd (DC 17 Ref neg)
Wind Wall (Air2 Evoc): R200' 100'x5' curtain of air scatters objects and deflects arrows and bolts for 10 rd
Word Of Chaos (Chaos7 Evoc): Nonchaotic creatures in 40' radius with equal/-1/-5/-10 HD deafened for 1d4 rd/stunned for 1 rd/confused for 1d10 min/killed (DC 16 Will neg)
Magic Notes:
Spell Focus (Divination): +1 Spell DC (Divination)
Spell Focus (Illusion): +1 Spell DC (Illusion)
Animal Talk: May use Speak With Animals effects 1/dy
Arcane Adept: May use magic device as W5
Aura: Visible to Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law based on deity alignment
Deadly Touch: Touch kills target w/up to 10d6 HP 1/dy
Empower Spell: May use +2 spell slot to increase chosen spell variable effects by 50%
Empowered Chaos: +1 caster level on Chaos spells
Empowered Evil: +1 caster level on Evil spells
Empowered Good: +1 caster level on Good spells
Empowered Healing: +1 caster level on Heal spells
Empowered Knowledge: +1 caster level on Divination spells
Empowered Law: +1 caster level on Law spells
Eschew Materials: May cast spells w/out materials
Protective Touch: Touched gains +10 on next save w/in 1 hour 1/dy
Spontaneous Cleric Spell: May cast Cure or Inflict in place of known spell
Unhindered: May use Freedom Of Movement effects 10 rd/dy
Notes
Validation Warnings:
Deceptive Knowledge: Implies bluff skill, disguise skill or hide skill
Nature Knowledge: Implies knowledge (nature) skill
Outdoors Knowledge: Implies survival skill
Validation Errors:
Cleric-Chaos Domain Selectable Feature: Requires alignment (currently Neutral) matches 'Chaotic', deity domains matches 'Chaos' and cleric level (currently 10)
Cleric-Evil Domain Selectable Feature: Requires alignment (currently Neutral) matches 'Evil', deity domains matches 'Evil' and cleric level (currently 10)
Cleric-Good Domain Selectable Feature: Requires alignment (currently Neutral) matches 'Good', deity domains matches 'Good' and cleric level (currently 10)
Cleric-Law Domain Selectable Feature: Requires alignment (currently Neutral) matches 'Lawful', deity domains matches 'Law' and cleric level (currently 10)
Selectable Feature Allocation: 2 available vs. 22 allocated
